text.en: Embodiment of all buddhas, guardian of beings, Karmapa—
Host of peaceful and wrathful yidams who rain down siddhis,
Vajra of the Supreme Vehicle  (Tekchok Dorje), embodiment of all—
text.en-trans: kündü tekpa chok gi dorjé la

text.en: I pray to you now! Bestow your blessings!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Pacify misdeeds and obscurations, negative factors and obstacles,
text.en-trans: dikdrib kyen ngen barché zhiwa dang

text.en: And swiftly bestow the siddhis, ordinary and supreme!
text.en-trans: chok dang tünmong ngödrub nyurdu tsol

text.en: In this life, may I directly realize my mind as dharmakāya,
text.en-trans: tsé dir rangsem chöku ngön sum tok

text.en: And hereafter, may I be reborn in the celestial realms!
text.en-trans: chima khachö zhing du kyewar shok
